course_description: This course exposes students to philosophical and ethical dimensions of human-nature relationships. Students will consider their own views toward nature. Philosophical and ethical concepts are examined through readings, discussions, and group activities.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 3953, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Wegner, Status: Open
